any.TV Branding Kit

We have a branding kit!

➜ Download it here

You get:

  • any.TV intro
  • “What is any.TV?” video that you can re-upload to your YouTube channel
  • any.TV watermark
  • any.TV logos

Branding Kit Video

Re-upload the “What is any.TV” video to your channel to help your audience learn about any.TV!

(Yes, you may claim it, monetize it and puts ads around the video if you want to )

Encourage them to sign-up using your “Refer-a-Friend” link in the video description.

Why? When they do, any.TV pays YOU a lifetime 10% bonus on top of everything they make!

Note: When you add the “any.TV intro” to your videos, also add the following in your video description:

Credits

any.TV intro produced by EmotionVFX
➜ http://www.any.tv/emotionvfx

Thank you!

any.TV Team

  • HPKCentral

    If we upload the What is AnyTV to our own channels. Can we claim it and put ads on it? and also do we have to give credit in the description for the background music, who produced it?

    • http://www.any.tv/ George Helps You

      But please do add the credits you see on our branding page: http://www.any.tv/branding

  • FireDragonRAWR

    When will we get paid? And How will we receive it?

    • http://www.any.tv/ George Helps You

      Good question! any.TV pays you by Paypal or check every 30 days. See the any.TV FAQ for more info at: http://www.any.tv/faq – hope this helps!

  • FireDragonRAWR

    How do I get a partnership here and if there is a partnership program here do I have to leave my other YouTube network to join? And btw If I recommended a friend it will give me 5x more money?

    • http://www.any.tv/ George Helps You

      Great questions! To partner with any.TV, just sign up on our dashboard at http://www.dashboard.tm – that’s it! No contract to sign, no lock-in and you can leave anytime. Also, you *do not* need to unpartner from your current network. Why? Because we don’t partner YouTube channels! any.TV creates a new revenue stream for all YouTubers call “recommendation revenue”. You will earn both your YouTube ad revenue and any.TV recommendation revenue at the same time! Hope this helps.
